Class LineGraphSeries.Styles

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jjoe64.graphview.series.LineGraphSeries.Styles
  • Enclosing class:
    LineGraphSeries<E extends DataPointInterface>

    private final class LineGraphSeries.Styles
extends java.lang.Object
    wrapped styles regarding the line

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int backgroundColor
      the background color for the filling under the line.
      private float dataPointsRadius
      the radius for the data points.
      private boolean drawBackground
      flag whether the area under the line to the bottom of the viewport will be filled with a specific background color.
      private boolean drawDataPoints
      flag whether the data points are highlighted as a visible point.
      private int thickness
      the thickness of the line.

      • dataPointsRadius

        private float dataPointsRadius
        the radius for the data points.
        See Also:

      • drawBackground

        private boolean drawBackground
        flag whether the area under the line to the bottom of the viewport will be filled with a specific background color.
        See Also:
        backgroundColor

      • drawDataPoints

        private boolean drawDataPoints
        flag whether the data points are highlighted as a visible point.
        See Also:
        dataPointsRadius

      • thickness

        private int thickness
        the thickness of the line. This option will be ignored if you are using a custom paint via LineGraphSeries.setCustomPaint(Paint)
